question:
Which one is the correct chronological order of the following events?
I. Quit India Movement
II. Shimla Conference
III. Poona Pact
IV. Cabinet Mission
explanation: Poona Pact was signed 84 years ago on September 24, 1932. 'Quit India' movement was launched on 8 August 1942. The Simla Conference was conducted in 1945 in Simla, India. The Cabinet Mission came to India in 1946.
